text: vahee hai jisane tumhen dharatee mein dharatee mein khaleefa (adhikaaree, uttaaraadhikaaree) banaaya aur tumamen se kuchh logon ke darje kuchh logon kee apeksha oonche rakhe, taaki jo kuchh usane tumako diya hai usamen vah tamhaaree le. nissandeh tumhaara rab jald saza denevaala hai. aur nishchay hee vahee bada kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
